alert.note: Alert for Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 1:13PM PST until February 28 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Cascades and Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades. This includes, Willamette Pass Crater Lake, Diamond Lake, Lake of the Woods, and Siskiyou Summit. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible due to snow covered roads. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors. * A Winter Storm Warning means that severe winter weather is occurring and poses a threat to life and property. Take protective action now.

area.areaDesc: Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades
